description: Check if LLM providers are configured in the database

steps.description: Check what LLM provider tables and data exist

queries: SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name LIKE '%provider%';
SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table' AND name LIKE '%llm%';
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_llm_providers FROM llm_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, is_active FROM llm_providers LIMIT 5;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_activations FROM activations;
SELECT activation_id, status, created_at FROM activations ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 3;
